game.name: Subway Runner
game.description:
It is time to run fast and make some new records in your own style. We proud to introduce you one of the best adventure games for boys that is pretty similar to the most popular running game named “Subway Surfers.” Join Subway Runner game and get ready to run like a true racer on the railway track. Do not bother no one can stop except you to become a winner. Put your fingers on the arrow keys and be prepared to get you participated in one of the biggest running competitions of your life. 
The running track is full of obstacles that may be in different types. Avoid all objects that come on your way, grab the power-ups and also try to collect as many gold coins as you can. You can use those coins to unlock new characters. You can increase the collection of coins with the help of the magnets. It is time to challenge your all running limits and rush, run and surf in unknown subways in this cool html5 runner game. You will lose if you fall down or hit any objects. 
The smooth running to control along with the beautiful graphics and seamless gameplay will definitely promote you to try it out for long. There are different characters to select from, various lightning fast swipe acrobatics as well as colorful and vivid HD graphics. Common friends, we know that you have the skill-set to accomplish the task to unlock more exciting and amazing reward of score multiplier. Check out more running games for kids and have a blast online, no download required.
